```{r pancreas 31876542, include=FALSE}

PMID_31876542 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('31876542', database = 'PubMed')

citation_31876542 <- paste0(PMID_31876542$journal,' ', PMID_31876542$year, ' ', PMID_31876542$month,';', PMID_31876542$volume,'(', PMID_31876542$number,'):', PMID_31876542$pages)

PubMed_31876542 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_31876542$eprint)

doi_31876542 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_31876542$doi)

Sys.sleep(2)

```
